name: NewsCatcher
long_description:
NewsCatcher collects multi-language news data from 140,000+ sources and over 1.5 million articles daily, enriches every item and delivers only the signals a client cares about—already mapped to their data models, tools, and security requirements. Alongside news, we also cover signals from municipal, government, regulatory, and corporate sources. 

Today, risk departments, policy teams, product strategists, and AI researchers rely on NewsCatcher to surface mission‑critical events in seconds and keep them embedded in workflows for years.
one_liner: We transform public web data into live signals that power search,…
